verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against it,

And say <S%H559><s%> unto it, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, O mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, I am against thee, and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> against thee, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee most <S%H4923><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>. most: Heb. desolation and desolation
I will lay <S%H7760><s%> thy cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>, and thou shalt be desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Because thou hast had a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> hatred <S%H342><s%>, and hast shed <S%H5064><s%> the blood of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the force <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%>, in the time <S%H6256><s%> that their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> had an end <S%H7093><s%>: perpetual: or, hatred of old shed: Heb. poured out the children force: Heb. hands

Therefore, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, I will prepare <S%H6213><s%> thee unto blood <S%H1818><s%>, and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee: sith <S%H518><s%> thou hast not hated <S%H8130><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, even blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee.

Thus will I make <S%H5414><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> most <S%H8077><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> from it him that passeth out <S%H5674><s%> and him that returneth <S%H7725><s%>. most: Heb. desolation and desolation

And I will fill <S%H4390><s%> his mountains <S%H2022><s%> with his slain <S%H2491><s%> men: in thy hills <S%H1389><s%>, and in thy valleys <S%H1516><s%>, and in all thy rivers <S%H650><s%>, shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> that are slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee perpetual <S%H5769><s%> desolations <S%H8077><s%>, and thy cities <S%H5892><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H3427><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Because thou hast said <S%H559><s%>, These two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and these two <S%H8147><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> shall be mine, and we will possess <S%H3423><s%> it; whereas the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was there: whereas: or, though the LORD was there

Therefore, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, I will even do <S%H6213><s%> according to thine anger <S%H639><s%>, and according to thine envy <S%H7068><s%> which thou hast used <S%H6213><s%> out of thy hatred <S%H8135><s%> against them; and I will make myself known <S%H3045><s%> among them, when I have judged <S%H8199><s%> thee.

And thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and that I have heard <S%H8085><s%> all thy blasphemies <S%H5007><s%> which thou hast spoken <S%H559><s%> against the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, They are laid desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8077><s%>, they are given <S%H5414><s%> us to consume <S%H402><s%>. to consume: Heb. to devour

Thus with your mouth <S%H6310><s%> ye have boasted <S%H1431><s%> against me, and have multiplied <S%H6280><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> against me: I have heard <S%H8085><s%> them. boasted: Heb. magnified
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; When the whole earth <S%H776><s%> rejoiceth <S%H8055><s%>, I will make <S%H6213><s%> thee desolate <S%H8077><s%>.

As thou didst rejoice <S%H8057><s%> at the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because it was desolate <S%H8074><s%>, so will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee: thou shalt be desolate <S%H8077><s%>, O mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and all Idumea <S%H123><s%>, even all of it: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
